Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that shows the effects of having water and light.
The student can draw a plant that shows the effects of lacking water.
The student can draw a plant that shows the effects of lacking light.
The student can show and label that plants need water to live and grow.
The student can show and label that plants need light to live and grow.
The student can identify patterns in their observations of the effects of water and light on plant growth.
